bill.summary: 5/10/1994--Introduced. Social Security COLA Limitation Act of 1994 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to establish a flat-rate cost-of-living adjustment. (Currently such adjustment is based on a beneficiary's actual benefit levels.)
